#summary How to use Maven to create a distributable jar.
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Building using Maven =
*To build DummyJDBC you have to use Java 6 because in Java 7 new methods were introduced in {{{java.sql}}} which DummyJDBC doesn't override.*

To create a jar which only contains the DummyJDBC classes call:
{{{
mvn package
}}}

To create a jar which additionally contains the dependencies (OpenCSV, AspectJ) call
{{{
mvn package assembly:single
}}}

= Build Problems =
== Wrong JDK version ==
DummyJDBC extends classes from the {{{java.sql}}} package. In some classes new methods were introduced in Java 7.
